plot: A former art student returns from Europe to run the department store he inherited from his father and finds his employees behaving very bizarrely.
title: Shop Talk
plot_es: A former art student returns from Europe to run the department store he inherited from his father and finds his employees behaving very bizarrely.
plot_en: A former art student returns from Europe to run the department store he inherited from his father and finds his employees behaving very bizarrely.
